name: include-fussball-de-widgets
description: Easy integration of the fussball.de widgets (currently in the version since season 2016) for Wordpress.
author: IT-Service Böhm -- Alexander Böhm

scripts.release:copy: rsync -a readme.txt LICENSE fubade-api.js *.php .releases/include-fussball-de-widgets/trunk/ && rsync -a dist/blocks.build.js dist/blocks.editor.build.css .releases/include-fussball-de-widgets/trunk/dist/
